content.body: TabAtkins:  https://drafts.fxtf.org/compositing/#abstract is showing something other than the expected spec. I guess that must be due to whatever underlying problem is causing https://api.csswg.org/bikeshed/ to not work as expected

content.body: But yeah, I think fxtf and houdini aren't using the same build setup as the csswg atm because we haven't gotten around to it, so if the server is hiccuping it might affect them.
